Apache Flex at 360|Stack

Aug 1, 2013 â€¢ {"display_name"=>"aharui", "login"=>"aharui", "email"=>"aharui@apache.org"}

Come see us at 360|Stack in Denver, Aug 4-8. Several Apache Flex committers will be
there and you can find us hanging out between sessions in the Apache Flex Discovery
Room which will be in the Englewood room at the conference hotel. There will be
munchies until we run out.

There are still a few tickets left if you can get over to Denver and learn about the latest on
Flex, including a prototype of Flex running in a browser without Flash. The organizer was
even kind enough to come up with a special discount code to use when your register to
save 20%. Just use "AlexRocks" when registering.

Hope to see you there!
